author: ayaxlabombarda
title: Innovatio Crowdfunding Launchpad
description: The Launchpads on the Cardano Blockchain DeFi ecosystem don't support projects outside the blockchain world.
solution: Develop a crowdfunding platform that accepts funding for projects outside and inside the blockchain world.
experience: Team founded in the previous Catalyst, project with one year of study/work, team with different expertise.
